name: 宵桜
summary: Keiichi Kikuchi is a 3rd grade student who likes to read and talks to the flowers on the roadside. There is a girl who is afraid to confess her feelings to him, there are cats who attacks people at nights and there are other evils at school. Everything shall depend on the actions of the hero.
info:
• 中文名: 宵樱
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 1998-05-01
